meanings.definition: A small refrigerator in a hotel room stocked with drinks and snacks.
meanings.sent1: The minibar in the hotel room had cold drinks and snacks for guests.
meanings.sent2: I always enjoy picking out a treat from the minibar when staying at a hotel.
meanings.sent3: When the minibar started talking, I knew I had watched too many cartoons.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was like a minibar, full of joy and refreshment.
meanings.sent5: The colorful lights of the minibar beckoned me to indulge in its offerings.

meanings.definition: A small cabinet or shelf containing alcoholic beverages in a private home.
meanings.sent1: We keep our favorite wines in the minibar in the living room.
meanings.sent2: The minibar in the corner adds a touch of elegance to the room.
meanings.sent3: The cat thought the minibar was a secret portal to a fish wonderland.
meanings.sent4: His words flowed smoothly, like a well-stocked minibar at a party.
meanings.sent5: The minibar gleamed with bottles of liquid gold, tempting all who passed by.
